description: CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID: Foreign Key, linking to CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID in CEN_CENSUS_SUBDIVISIONS, e.g., 5901022
CENSUS YEAR is the census year that the data is collected. e.g., 2006, 2011.
Average daily maximum air temperature (ÁC) - January
Average daily maximum air temperature (ÁC) - July
Average daily minimum air temperature (ÁC) - January
Average daily minimum air temperature (ÁC) - July
Precipitation as snow (mm) between August in previous year and July in current year. Note that this corresponds roughly to snowfall in cm.
